name: Neon Bishop
description:
GGJ2022 Submission - Made in 2 days
A turn based isometric pixel art strategy game. Defend objectives while defeating invaders from your planet. Use Phoenix to kill invaders and Aegis to defend objectives by positioning Aegis between enemies and objectives.

Arrow Keys- Move camera

Left click- Select/move character

Right click- Unselect

Credits:

Selim Ağacan - Developer

Seçil Ağacan - Pixel art

Kardelen Erdinç - Music
